SELECT a.RENTAL_ID, a.PRODUCT_ID, a.PRODUCT_NAME, a.MEMBER_ID, m.NAME, m.PHONE, a.RENTAL_ADDRESS, to_char(a.RENTAL_START, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), to_char(a.RENTAL_END, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), a.RENTAL_PAY, a.RENTAL_WAYBILL FROM ( SELECT r.*, pr.product_name, pr.ppl FROM product pr, rental r WHERE pr.product_id = r.product_id ) a, member m WHERE a.member_id = m.member_id AND rental_waybill IS NULL ORDER BY rental_id
